did.abstract: This collection includes various materials spanning 1891 to 1896 and relating to Reverend David Young. Reverend David Young (1719-1752) was born in Southold, Long Island and graduated from Yale College in 1741. He was ordained in either Setauket or Brookhaven, Long Island in 1742.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Reverend David Young (1719-1752) was born in Southold, Long Island and graduated from Yale College in 1741. He was ordained in either Setauket or Brookhaven, Long Island in 1742.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes various materials spanning 1891 to 1896 and relating to Reverend David Young, including originals of some of Reverend David Young's sermons; research notes on important dates in Young's life and sermons; a copy of a letter from Jonathan Barber to Young's wife sending condolences upon Young's death; a copy of an excerpt from A History of the Presbyterian Church in America containing a biographical sketch of Young; correspondence concerning Young's research; and an unidentified sketch map.
